title: [SDMP 0.10.1](http://sdmp.github.io/) Relationship Resource Schema
description: Schema for the relationship resources of the SDMP.

relationship.description: Root property which indicates user/user and user/node relationships.

type.description: For user-to-node, use 'host' or 'publisher', and for user-to-user, 'connection'.

identity.description: The key fingerprint of the user or node being added as a relationship. This is equivalent to the SHA-512 of the other identities public key, whose octets are [unpadded base64url](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-5) encoded.
